definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The N6 macroelementsand the MS microelements were advantageous to callus formation.
sentences.chinese: N6大量元素和MS微量元素有利于愈伤组织的分化。

sentences.english: Other studies have suggested that tight control can reverse microalbuminuria.
sentences.chinese: 其他研究都表明了严格控制可以逆转微量尿蛋白。

sentences.english: Traces of plutnonium were detected in samples taken on March 21 and 22.
sentences.chinese: 在21日和22日的土壤监测中，发现微量钚元素。

sentences.english: A thimbleful of a neutron star would weigh over 100 million tons
sentences.chinese: 一颗中子星很微量的一部分，重量也会超过1亿吨。

sentences.english: After removing eyeballs, peripheral blood was obtained by micro-injector.
sentences.chinese: 眼球摘除后微量进样器于眼窝处取外周血。

sentences.english: Micronutrient deficiencies are also common in this region.
sentences.chinese: 微量营养素缺乏在这一地区也很普遍。

sentences.english: Trace copper in powdered drinks is determined by the EDTA titrimetry.
sentences.chinese: 采用EDTA减量滴定法测定固体饮料中的微量铜。

sentences.english: The perplexing problems of identifying the amount of SO42- in dyes are successfully solved.
sentences.chinese: 解决了分析染液中微量硫酸根离子的难题。

sentences.english: The effect of tiny amount of Titamium on the notch toughness of low carbon boron steel was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了微量钛对低碳硼钢冲击韧性的影响。

sentences.english: Some donors and health communities have embraced micronutrient interventions.
sentences.chinese: 一些捐助者和卫生界已经接纳了微量营养物质干预。

sentences.english: Biochip technology was a kind of novel microanalysis technology.
sentences.chinese: 生物芯片检测技术是一种全新的微量分析技术。

sentences.english: METHODS The oxygen consumption of live cells of guinea pig was measured by Warburg instrument.
sentences.chinese: 方法应用微量呼吸检压仪测定豚鼠肝细胞耗氧量。

sentences.english: The application of activated carbon fibers (ACFs) to removing phenol from water was studied.
sentences.chinese: 采用活性炭纤维吸附法净化水中微量的苯酚。

sentences.english: Objective To study the alkaloid structures of stemona japonica Miq.
sentences.chinese: 研究蔓生百部中微量生物碱的结构。

sentences.english: The microculture assay has also been briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文还对微量细胞培养试验方法作简要的讨论。

sentences.english: Zinc is another micronutrient with tremendous promise for saving lives.
sentences.chinese: 另一种挽救生命的前景很大的微量营养物质是锌。
